Pre-reqs: (Third-year standing.)
Registration is limited to students in the UBC Sciences Po Dual BA program. This course is a community-based experiential learning course that runs both Winter Term 1 and Term 2. Students will receive more information directly from the program and instructor, with meeting times and locations to be determined closer to the start of term.

description: Principles and practice of conducting research in community partnership.
